name: Department of Homeland Security v. New York
question: Is the Department of Homeland Security’s modified “public charge” rule arbitrary and capricious, in violation of the Administrative Procedure Act?
description: A case in which the Court will consider a challenge to the “public charge” rule of the Immigration and Nationality Act, which prohibits noncitizens from receiving a green card if the government believes they are likely to become reliant on government assistance.
